# ⭐ Easy Python Programs (101-300)

**Difficulty:** ⭐ Easy | **Time:** 15-30 minutes each

---

## Issue Groups

### #004 - 50 Special Number Programs
**Files:** `basics/03_control_flow/101_*` to `basics/03_control_flow/150_*`  
**Skills:** Loops, conditionals, number theory

**Programs Included:**
101. Check if Number is Prime
102. Check if Number is Armstrong
103. Check if Number is Palindrome
104. Check if Number is Perfect
105. Find All Factors of a Number
106. Generate Prime Numbers in Range
107. Generate Armstrong Numbers in Range
108. Generate Palindrome Numbers in Range
109. Find Prime Factorization
110. Check if Number is Strong Number
111. Find Neon Number
112. Check if Number is Automorphic
113. Find Trimorphic Number
114. Check if Number is Duck Number
115. Find Sunny Number
116. Check if Number is Harshad Number
117. Find Magic Number
118. Check if Number is Kaprekar Number
119. Find Peterson Number
120. Check if Number is Spy Number
121. Find Tech Number
122. Check if Number is Unique Number
123. Find Circular Prime
124. Check if Number is Emirp Number
125. Find Twin Primes
126. Check if Numbers are Co-prime
127. Find Friendly Numbers
128. Check if Number is Abundant
129. Find Deficient Number
130. Check if Number is Semi-perfect
131. Find Weird Number
132. Check if Number is Untouchable
133. Find Amicable Numbers
134. Check if Number is Sociable
135. Find Vampire Number
136. Check if Number is Strobogrammatic
137. Find Pandigital Number
138. Check if Number is Self Number
139. Find Junction Number
140. Check if Number is Polite Number
141. Find Powerful Number
142. Check if Number is Achilles Number
143. Find Frugal Number
144. Check if Number is Extravagant
145. Find Equidigital Number
146. Check if Number is Odious
147. Find Evil Number
148. Check if Number is Lucky
149. Find Happy Number
150. Check if Number is Sad Number

---

### #005 - 50 String Manipulation Programs
**Files:** `basics/06_strings/151_*` to `basics/06_strings/200_*`  
**Skills:** String operations, slicing, methods, regex

**Programs Included:**
151. Count Vowels in a String
152. Count Consonants in a String
153. Count Words in a String
154. Reverse a String Without Slicing
155. Check if String is Palindrome
156. Remove All Vowels from String
157. Remove All Consonants from String
158. Count Occurrences of a Character
159. Find Longest Word in Sentence
160. Capitalize First Letter of Each Word
161. Convert String to Uppercase Manually
162. Convert String to Lowercase Manually
163. Toggle Case of Each Character
164. Remove Duplicate Characters from String
165. Find First Non-Repeating Character
166. Check if Two Strings are Anagrams
167. Check if String is Pangram
168. Find All Permutations of a String
169. Generate All Substrings of a String
170. Find Longest Common Prefix
171. Check if String Contains Only Digits
172. Check if String Contains Only Letters
173. Check if String is Alphanumeric
174. Count Uppercase and Lowercase Letters
175. Find Character with Maximum Frequency
176. Replace All Spaces with Underscore
177. Remove All Special Characters
178. Extract Numbers from String
179. Extract Emails from Text
180. Extract Phone Numbers from Text
181. Check if String is Valid Password
182. Generate Random Password
183. Encrypt String Using Caesar Cipher
184. Decrypt Caesar Cipher String
185. Convert String to Title Case
186. Find Shortest Word in Sentence
187. Count Syllables in a Word
188. Check if Words Rhyme
189. Find All Anagrams in a List
190. Sort String Alphabetically
191. Merge Two Strings Alternately
192. Find Common Characters in Two Strings
193. Check if String is Rotation of Another
194. Find Edit Distance Between Strings
195. Compress String (aaabbc → a3b2c1)
196. Decompress String (a3b2c1 → aaabbc)
197. Find Longest Palindromic Substring
198. Check if String is Interleaving of Two
199. Find First Unique Character Index
200. Convert Roman Numeral to Integer

### #006 - 50 List Operations Programs
**Files:** `basics/05_data_structures/201_*` to `basics/05_data_structures/250_*`  
**Skills:** Lists, loops, sorting, searching, algorithms

**Programs Included:**
201. Find Sum of All Elements in List
202. Find Maximum Element in List
203. Find Minimum Element in List
204. Find Average of List Elements
205. Count Even Numbers in List
206. Count Odd Numbers in List
207. Find Second Largest Number
208. Find Second Smallest Number
209. Remove Duplicates from List
210. Merge Two Sorted Lists
211. Find Intersection of Two Lists
212. Find Union of Two Lists
213. Find Difference of Two Lists
214. Check if List is Sorted
215. Sort List Without Using sort()
216. Reverse a List Without Slicing
217. Rotate List by n Positions
218. Find All Pairs with Given Sum
219. Find Triplets with Zero Sum
220. Move All Zeros to End of List
221. Find Majority Element in List
222. Find Missing Number in Sequence
223. Find Duplicate Number in List
224. Find All Duplicates in List
225. Find kth Largest Element
226. Find kth Smallest Element
227. Count Frequency of Each Element
228. Find Elements Appearing More Than n/k Times
229. Find Peak Element in List
230. Find Equilibrium Index
231. Find Pivot Index
232. Find Maximum Product Subarray
233. Find Maximum Sum Subarray
234. Find Contiguous Subarray with Sum k
235. Check if List Contains Consecutive Numbers
236. Find All Subarrays with Sum k
237. Rearrange Positive and Negative Numbers
238. Replace Each Element with Product of Others
239. Find Leaders in an Array
240. Find Trapping Rainwater
241. Implement Bubble Sort
242. Implement Selection Sort
243. Implement Insertion Sort

245. Implement Quick Sort
246. Implement Heap Sort
247. Implement Counting Sort
248. Implement Radix Sort
249. Implement Shell Sort
250. Implement Cocktail Sort

### #007 - 50 Dictionary Operations Programs
**Files:** `basics/05_data_structures/251_*` to `basics/05_data_structures/300_*`  
**Skills:** Dictionaries, key-value operations, real-world applications

**Programs Included:**
251. Create Dictionary from Two Lists
252. Merge Two Dictionaries
253. Find Key with Maximum Value
254. Find Key with Minimum Value
255. Sort Dictionary by Keys
256. Sort Dictionary by Values
257. Remove Key from Dictionary
258. Check if Key Exists in Dictionary
259. Count Frequency Using Dictionary
260. Invert Dictionary (Swap Keys and Values)
261. Find Common Keys in Two Dictionaries
262. Find Unique Keys in Dictionaries
263. Create Nested Dictionary
264. Flatten Nested Dictionary
265. Convert Dictionary to List of Tuples
266. Convert List of Tuples to Dictionary
267. Filter Dictionary by Value
268. Filter Dictionary by Key
269. Group Dictionary Items by Value
270. Find Top n Values in Dictionary
271. Calculate Sum of All Values
272. Calculate Average of All Values
273. Find Keys with Same Value
274. Update Dictionary with Another
275. Create Dictionary from String
276. Count Words in Sentence Using Dict
277. Find Most Frequent Word
278. Create Phonebook Dictionary
279. Add Contact to Phonebook
280. Search Contact in Phonebook
281. Delete Contact from Phonebook
282. Update Contact in Phonebook
283. Create Inventory Dictionary
284. Add Item to Inventory
285. Remove Item from Inventory
286. Update Item Quantity
287. Calculate Total Inventory Value
288. Find Items Below Threshold
289. Create Student Grades Dictionary
290. Calculate Student GPA
291. Find Top Performer
292. Find Failing Students
293. Create Employee Salary Dictionary
294. Calculate Average Salary
295. Find Highest Paid Employee
296. Find Lowest Paid Employee
297. Give Salary Increment
298. Create Expense Tracker Dictionary
299. Categorize Expenses
300. Generate Expense Report

## Progress Tracking

- [ ] #004 - 50 Special Number Programs
- [ ] #005 - 50 String Manipulation Programs
- [ ] #006 - 50 List Operations Programs
- [ ] #007 - 50 Dictionary Operations Programs

---

## Skills You'll Learn

✅ **Number Theory** - Prime, Armstrong, Palindrome, Perfect numbers  
✅ **String Operations** - Manipulation, validation, encryption  
✅ **List Algorithms** - Sorting, searching, manipulation  
✅ **Dictionary Operations** - CRUD, aggregation, real-world apps  
✅ **Problem Solving** - Logic building, optimization  
✅ **Data Structures** - Lists, dicts, tuples, sets  

---

## How to Submit

1. **Pick an issue group** (e.g., #004)
2. **Create all 50 programs** in the group
3. **Add test cases** for each program
4. **Include comments** explaining logic
5. **Submit PR** with issue number in title
